Articles.Content: When selecting a crew and their modules to be in , I then save the craft and do something else. But when I load the ship again its goes back to defaults of Jeb,BOb, and Bill. Is there a fix?

As of 0.25 there isn't a fix, unless you use mods. I don't remember any mods that will help, but I know they're out there because I have one of those installed (to clear any confusion originating from this statement, look at my signature). I will try to figure it out by looking at the names of my mods, but don't expect anything.

Iirc the crew slots will be saved as of 0.90.

Hello, you can try RealRoster

OMG, I have been looking for a mod like this for ages!!!!! Thanks!!!!!!
OMG!!! trying out now! IT HAS A BLACKLIST FUNCTION! Im banning the default orange suits!
